name: Oh No There's Bats!!!
description:
Made for Mix and Game Jam 2020!

The theme this year was Mixing Genres, so i went for a platformer tower - defence. Ah boy was it a challenge.

The aim is to protect your base (the cube) from the bats using melee and turrets that shoot electricity.

controls: Move = Left and Right arrowkeys, Jump = Space / Up arrowkey, Attack = A, Place a turret = S.

Some bugs: You sorta have infinite money right now, so go ham!
